name: RFL_CVG_DEN_START
description: Related multi table for the Auth-Cert Denials Start Date (I RFL 8520) item - coverage level denied days start date.

columns.name: REFERRAL_ID
columns.description: The referral ID for the referral record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number of the associated coverage for this referral record. Together with REFERRAL_ID, this forms the foreign key to the REFERRAL_CVG_BED table.

columns.name: DENIED_START_DATE
columns.description: The start date for the denial(s)
